div.div:
62 Mechanic St, Bucksport, ME 04416

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

a.title: back of school bus with emergency door opens google.com in a new window

img.alt: back of school bus with emergency door opens google.com in a new window

div.p:
Welcome to Regional School Unit 25, proudly serving the member communities of Bucksport, Orland, Prospect, and Verona Island. RSU 25 provides educational programming for approximately 1075 students in grades PK-12 as well as offering a full service Adult Education program. RSU 25, in partnership with our communities, is committed to meeting the needs of all learners in our district.
If you have any questions that need immediate answers, please contact us.
James Boothby
Superintendent of Schools
Phone: 207-469-7311
Fax: 207-469-6640
